rules_text:
Flash
When Blur Leopard enters, exile another target nonland permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
notes:
New card — replaced Analytical Critic

The critic cycle is cute, but I wanted to minimize the amount of non-colorless food production blue and red had. I’m also really fond of this design as a fixed Felidar Guardian. It marries the flash and flicker archetypes together in a powerful and interesting way.
